page.title: 08Development Near World's End
page.content: Many houses in this area have been extended, only 10 new houses have been built in the past 5 years. Many doctors, lawyers and pilots live in the area as London, Bristol, Reading and Swindon are easily accessible. 50 years ago, farms used horses and had double the workforce. Machinery has changed all that. This has made life easier and improved crops. There is one new crop from Germany called Trikkally. It is a cross between Wheat and Rape. At one farm, the topsoil has been taken off, leaving a layer of sand. This is taken to be used in building and road construction and then the top layer is restored. This makes money and improves the soil.
